title.v: Chuyển đơn hàng sang lệnh sản xuất

action.text:
declare @stt_rec_dh char(13), @stt_rec char(13), @ngay_yc smalldatetime, @so_ct varchar(32), @ma_vt varchar(32), @ma_kho char(16), @so_luong numeric(19, 4), @dvt nvarchar(32), @he_so numeric(19, 4), @ws char(1), @maxLength int select top 0 stt_rec_dh as stt_rec into #r from mpkcsx select @ws = val from options where name = 'm_ws_id'
select @maxLength = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'mpkcsx' and column_name = 'so_ct' select stt_rec_dh into #d1 from mpkcsx where exists(select 1 from @s where patindex('%'+ rtrim(case when stt_rec_dh <> '' then stt_rec_dh else '*' end) + '%', text) > 0)
declare cr cursor for select stt_rec_dh from #d1 open cr fetch next from cr into @stt_rec_dh while @@fetch_status = 0 begin insert into #r exec AI_ERP$App$GetIdentityNumber @ws, 'SX1', 'phsx', @@userID select @stt_rec = stt_rec from #r select @ngay_yc = ngay_yc, @so_ct = so_ct, @ma_vt = ma_vt, @so_luong = so_luong, @dvt = dvt, @he_so = he_so, @ma_kho = ma_kho from mpkcsx where stt_rec_dh = @stt_rec_dh exec rs_MPSConvertMPS2MO @stt_rec, @@unit, 'SX1', '1', @ngay_yc, '', @so_ct, @ma_vt, @ma_kho, @so_luong, @dvt, @he_so, @maxLength, @stt_rec_dh, @@language, @@userID, @@admin
exec rs_MPSAfterConvertMPS2MO @stt_rec_dh, @@userID
exec AI_ERP$App$Voucher$UpdateInquiryTable 'SX1', 'isx', 'phsx', 'ctsx', 'stt_rec', @stt_rec, 'ma_gd,ma_kh;#10$,#20$; , :ma_kho,ma_vt;#10$,#20$;ctsx,ctsx' exec AI_ERP$App$Voucher$UpdateGeneral 'SX1', 'phsx', 'ctsx', 'isx', 'phsx', @stt_rec delete #r
fetch next from cr into @stt_rec_dh end drop table #r, #d1 close cr deallocate cr select '1' as v return

update mpctyc set nguon = nguon2, xac_nhan = xac_nhan2 where exists(select 1 from @s where patindex('%'+ rtrim(case when stt_rec <> '' then stt_rec else '*' end) + '%', text) > 0) and nguon2 = 'PL' delete mpkcsx where exists(select 1 from @s where patindex('%'+ rtrim(case when stt_rec_dh <> '' then stt_rec_dh else '*' end) + '%', text) > 0) select '1' as v return
if exists(select 1 from dmkho where ma_kho = @ma_kho) begin select b.ten_dvcs%l from dmkho a left join dmdvcs b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs where a.ma_kho = @ma_kho return end
